hero.title: Contact Us
hero.description: Have questions or want to collaborate? Feel free to reach out anytime.

success.title: Message sent!
success.description: We'll get back to you soon.

q1.question: Is Sum Diary free?
q1.answer: Basic features are free. Advanced AI analysis features are available in the premium plan.

q2.question: Can I use HUA UX Framework commercially?
q2.answer: Yes, it's provided under the MIT license, allowing commercial use.

q3.question: How can I get technical support?
q3.answer: You can reach us through GitHub Issues or email.
